bwwExcerpt: Sure, there are actors so good you would pay to see them read the phone book. But how many are there that you would pay to watch them play a board game? Off hand, I can think of only one: Danny DeVito, who turns a solo game of Sorry into the comic highlight of Theresa Rebeckâ€™s new play I Need That, now receiving its world premiere on Broadway courtesy of the Roundabout Theater Company.
